error.mqtt: Sorry, there was a communication error with the Snips platform.
error.config: Sorry, there was an error with your config file.
error.localisation: Sorry, there was an error with your language settings.
error.intentNotRecognized: Sorry, I did not understand your request.

info.itsTimeTo: It's time for your reminder: {{ name }}.

ask.createReminder: Would you like to create one?
ask.name: How should I name this reminder?
ask.nameAndTime: When should I set this reminder and how should I name it?

info.reminder_SetFor_: Sure, I set a reminder named {{ name }} for {{ time }}.

info.noReminderFound: It seems that you have no reminder set for the moment.
info.noSuchRemindersFound: It seems that you have no such reminder set for the moment.
info.reminder_SetFor_: A reminder named {{ name }} is set for {{ time }}.

ask.confirm: I found {{ number }} reminder{{odd}}, are you sure to cancel all of them?
